      • returnPlan

        public PlanFile returnPlan(java.lang.String year)
                    throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException,
                           java.rmi.RemoteException
        Retreives the desired planfile without assigning it to currPlanFile. Useful for the comparison algorithm of the planComparisonSelectionView.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        java.rmi.RemoteException

      • pushPlan

        public void pushPlan(PlanFile plan)
              throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException,
                     java.rmi.RemoteException
        Saves planFile to the user's department if that planFile is marked as editable. If not editable, an exception is thrown. An exception is also thrown if a newly created planFile is not assigned a year.
        Parameters:
        plan -
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        java.rmi.RemoteException
